xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL:
1) Other non-current financial liabilities of Rs. 749.31 Crores includes Non-current Lease Liabilities Rs. 284.56 Crores and Other Non-current Financial Liabilities Rs. 464.75 Crores.

2) Trade payable, current of Rs. 12,069.08 Crores includes
a) Total outstanding dues of creditors other than Micro and small enterprises Rs. 6,053.41 Crores
b) Total outstanding dues of Micro and small enterprises Rs. 54.70 Crores
c) Acceptances Rs. 5,960.97 Crores

3) Other current financial liabilities of Rs. 1,183.07 Crores include Current Lease Liabilities Rs. 84.57 Crores and Other current Financial Liabilities Rs. 1,098.50 Crores.

4) Other non-current assets includes Rs. 858.37 Crores of Non-current tax assets (net)
